thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian shares Halloween photo with kids, North West
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian shares Halloween photo with kids, North West - UPI.com

author: Annie Martin
title: Kourtney Kardashian shares Halloween photo with kids, North West
text:
1 of 5 | License Photo LOS ANGELES, Oct. 26 (UPI) -- Kourtney Kardashian delighted fans with a photo with her children and niece North West on Saturday.
The 36-year-old reality star posted a picture of herself, 5-year-old son Mason, 3-year-old daughter Penelope, 10-month-old son Reign and 2-year-old North in their Halloween costumes on Instagram.
Kardashian dressed in a Wonder Woman bodysuit, while Mason, Penelope and Reign sported similar superhero-inspired outfits. North was adorable as a white and pink unicorn.
The reality star is mother to Mason, Penelope and Reign with ex-partner Scott Disick . She and the 32-year-old club promoter were together nine years before splitting up in July after Disick was spotted with his ex-girlfriend, Chloe Bartoli.
1 of 2 Kourtney Kardashian with her children Mason, Penelope, Reign and niece North. Instagram /Kourtney Kardashian Kardashian's sister, Kim Kardashian , welcomed North with Kanye West in June 2013, and is currently pregnant with her second child, a boy. The Kardashians came to fame on E! series Keeping Up with the Kardashians , which will return for an 11th season Nov. 15.
  Kourtney Kardashian shows off slim post-baby body Kourtney Kardashian kisses son Reign in new photo Scott Disick checks into rehab for drug and alcohol addiction Scott Disick on Kourtney Kardashian split: 'worst decision of my life'
